selected_quotes: A guide to interpreting echo reports for non-echo doctors #CardioEd #FOAMed
Nice quick guide on echos for those who don't deal with them routinely #tssmn
A terrific review of echocardiography (for non-imagers) and a must-read for cardiovascular clinical pharmacists!
I think the role of CMR should usually be before TEE, in many cases.
Thank you for writing this @ppsengupta1. It's a must read for cardiovascular informatics, #datascience #machinelearning folks.
